## GridTabulatorColumn class

The GridTabulator Column element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class GridTabulatorColumn extends GridTabulatorColumn_base 
```
**Extends:** GridTabulatorColumn\_base

## Remarks

Used inside the GridTabulator element to specify column definitions for a given column.
